name: A.O.D Big Belligerent Boss
text: If this card is Synchro Summoned: banish all other monsters on the field until the End Phase. Once per turn (Quick Effect): banish the top 3 cards of your Deck; banish cards on the field up to the number of "A.O.D" cards that were banished by this effect. If this card is banished or sent to the GY; Special Summon 1 "A.O.D" monster from your Deck, but its effects are negated. You can only Summon 1 "A.O.D Big Boss" per turn.
